definition: Manufactured parts or elements that provide structural support, movement, or functional integration within larger systems or buildings.

positive_examples: The construction crew installed steel beams to support the building's framework.
The mechanic replaced the worn piston in the car's engine block.
She grabbed the handrail to steady herself while climbing the stairs.
The warehouse workers used a ladder to reach items on the high shelves.
The cantilever beam extended from the wall to support the balcony.
He placed the books on the wooden shelf mounted above his desk.
negative_examples: The artist painted a beautiful landscape on the canvas.
She wore a comfortable cotton sweater to stay warm.
The chef used a sharp knife to cut the vegetables.
He drove his car to work every morning.
The musician played a melody on her violin.
The gardener planted flowers in the ceramic pot.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Vehicle, Tool, Clothing, Furniture, Container
